summary: Comprehensive testing of QualityStudio - Quality Management System completed. All 38 backend API tests passed (100%). All frontend pages load correctly with proper data display. Login/logout, role-based navigation, and all major features working as expected.

issues: Equipment Health shows 0% - may need data or calculation review

critical_code_review_comments: All navigation sections working correctly with role-based access control
AI service uses real GPT-5.2 via Emergent LLM Key - NOT MOCKED
Database has production data: 3 complaints, 4 defects, 4 RCAs, 2 CAPAs, 2 process runs, 1 golden batch, 3 SOPs

success_rate.frontend: 100% (all 17+ pages load correctly, navigation works, forms functional)

seed_data_creation: Database has production data imported: 3 complaints, 4 defects, 4 RCAs, 2 CAPAs, 2 process runs, 1 golden batch, 3 SOPs, 4 knowledge docs
context_for_next_testing_agent: All backend CRUD APIs working (38/38 tests passed). AI endpoints (rca-suggestions, classify-defect, generate-capa) use real GPT-5.2. Frontend uses Vite on port 3000, backend FastAPI on port 8001. Authentication is JWT-based with localStorage. Quick login buttons available on login page for different roles. Role-based navigation working correctly - Sales users don't see RCA Studio or Admin menu.
